networking

Class DBManage

  • java.lang.Object
    • networking.DBManage

  • public class DBManage
extends java.lang.Object
    DBManage is the universal database management class. It is used for any purpose regarding to the central database. Currently it supports the following usages:

    • login validation given username and password: userIdentityValidation(String, String)

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DBManage() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void connect()
      Connects to the database.
      void disconnect()
      Disconnects from the database.
      int userIdentityValidation(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String password)
      Validates login information.
      boolean userRegistration(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String password)
      Registers a new user in database.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • DBManage

        public DBManage()

    • Method Detail

      • connect

        public void connect()
        Connects to the database.

      • userIdentityValidation

        public int userIdentityValidation(java.lang.String username,
                                  java.lang.String password)
        Validates login information.
        Parameters:
        username - login username
        password - login password
        Returns:
        0 if there is a (username, password) match in the database; -1 if password is wrong; -2 if there is no such a username; -3 if database related exception raised

      • userRegistration

        public boolean userRegistration(java.lang.String username,
                                java.lang.String password)
        Registers a new user in database.
        Parameters:
        username - new user's username
        password - new user's password
        Returns:
        true if registration succeeds, false otherwise.

      • disconnect

        public void disconnect()
        Disconnects from the database.
